name: Code 509
description:
Overview

You're a grand theft auto victim fresh off the streets with a new ride! Unfortunately, the cops caught you in the act and are on your tail. Speed through the freeways of Los Angeles as you desperately try to outrun the pursuing police. Careful! The streets are filled with other cars and potholes that will slow you down!

Earn points by driving the farthest distance and collecting coins. Use can also use your coins to unlock awesome new car skins!

Controls
  • Arrow Keys: Move car left and right
  • Touch Left Screen: Move car left
  • Touch Right Screen: Move car right
  • Left Mouse Button: Select menu buttons
Credits Team
  • Ryan Dougherty - Programming/Art
  • Spencer Dickerson - Programming/UI
  • Kevin Geohegan  - Sound
Important Info

Code 509 will be coming to mobile soon! It was originally released on iOS for free download. However, we lost funding and were unable to keep the project on the AppStore. We will soon include a free mobile build on itch.io for iOS/Android
